name: SwordMaster (CarsynPeters)
description:
SwordMaster

---             Manual          ATCO

SwordMaster is a game made by ATCO, you can find their subreddit right here r/ATCOGames.

This game uses ASCII graphics or Text graphics.

Story:

You are a knight cursed to fight in an endless battle, but there will be an end to this soon. Fight through Knights and Heavy Knights. Can you survive through it all, or Parrish like the rest?!

Enemies:

There are 2 enemy types, Knights and Heavy Knights.

Knights have 20 Health and do 10 Damage They're the common ones.

Heavy Knights have 40 Health and do 20 Damage. 

Cheats:

There are cheats in this game!

GoldenSword - Gives you 100 Damage

DieNever - Gives you 100000 Health
